scripts.build: yarn tsc && yarn parcel build build/sidepanel.js build/background.js
scripts.build-tests: yarn tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && yarn parcel build --dist-dir build-test/dist/ build-test/js/**/*.test.js
scripts.clear: rm -rf build/ build-test/ dist/ extension/ extension.* .parcel-cache/
scripts.package: yarn build && sh prepare_extension.sh && rm -f extension.zip && zip -r extension.zip extension/*
scripts.test: yarn build-tests && xvfb-run yarn jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs
